remarks.format: ## Remarks 当支持更新的数据源控件绑定到控件，控件可以充分利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动更新功能。When a data source control that supports updating is bound to a control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating functionality. > [!NOTE] > 用于数据源控件更新数据，它必须配置来更新数据。For a data source control to update data, it must be configured to update data. 若要配置一个数据源控件，以更新记录，请参阅特定数据源控件的文档。To configure a data source control to update records, see the documentation for the specific data source control. 当属性设置为`true`，某一列 (由表示对象) 有一个编辑按钮，为每个数据行自动添加到控件。When the property is set to `true`, a column (represented by a object) with an Edit button for each data row is automatically added to the control. 单击某行编辑按钮使该行进入编辑模式。Clicking an Edit button for a row puts that row in edit mode. 当行处于编辑模式，每个列字段不是只读的行中显示相应的输入的控件，如控件，该字段的数据类型。When a row is in edit mode, each column field in the row that is not read-only displays the appropriate input control, such as a control, for the field's data type. 这允许用户修改字段的值。This allows the user to modify the field's value. 单击时，编辑按钮是也替换为更新按钮和取消按钮。When clicked, the Edit button is also replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button. 单击更新按钮使用任何值更改来更新数据源中的行，并返回要显示模式的行。Clicking the Update button updates the row in the data source with any value changes and returns the row to display mode. 单击取消按钮放弃任何值更改，并返回要显示模式的行。Clicking the Cancel button abandons any value changes and returns the row to display mode. > [!NOTE] > 你可以以编程方式将某行处于编辑模式通过设置与行的索引的属性。You can programmatically put a row in edit mode by setting the property with the index of the row. 若要以编程方式退出编辑模式，请设置为-1 的属性。To programmatically exit edit mode, set the property to -1. 使用内置的更新功能时，必须设置使用逗号分隔的字段列表的属性名称以标识主键字段或字段的数据源; 否则，内置的更新功能将不能更新正确的记录。When using the built-in updating functionality, you must set the property with a comma-separated list of field names to identify the primary key field or fields of the data source;
